fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Exactly one Thundercry Onslaught role will always spawn.
- If the Onslaught member dies, a random Thundercry memmber will become their role.
- The Thundercry starts with 4 Strikes, which all members can Astrally place on any player instead of their night action. They gain a Strike every three nights if they don't have any left.
- Strikes are publicly announced at the start of the day after they're placed, and are removed after death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who stand against the Thundercry

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Eliminate all who stand against the Thundercry
